title: Egyptian villagers
brief_description: Examines the village and family life in a small Egyptian farming community, and the future for those who live in villages throughout the country. Illustrates how education brings social change, and the blend of ancient and modern farming methods and patterns.
description: Examines the village and family life in a small Egyptian farming community, and the future for those who live in villages throughout the country. Illustrates how education brings social change, and the blend of ancient and modern farming methods and patterns.
